    Project Management

    We provide project managers for software development, infrastructure implementation, and organizational change projects. We focus on results, helping you realize the benefits of the project while minimizing its cost. Recent projects include

    • Relocating 200 servers to a remote data centre, on time, under budget, as part of a larger, 1,200 server relocation project
    • Relocating 600 servers to a remote data centre, on time, under budget, and with no significant outages to the business
    • changing the way 1,700 nurses give medication at three hospitals
    • virtualization of 200+ servers
    • enterprise backup acquisition
    • SAN implementation
    • data centre expansion
    • and electronic medical records software development
